Title: Il Mare
Writer: Eun-Jeong Kim, Tae-Yeon Won (letters), Ji-na Yeo
Actors: Jung-jae Lee, Ji-hyun Jun, Mu-saeng Kim, Seung-yeon Jo
Plot: Eun-joo moves out of her house "Il Mare", leaving behind a Christmas card for the eventual new owner of the house in 1999. In it she asks him/her to forward any mail of hers to her new ...
